title: International group praises green revival
summary: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

title: Krasnodar Court Freezes Bank Accounts of Companies Linked to Black Sea Oil Spill
summary: Rosprirodnadzor is seeking $614 million in damages from the two companies over the December 2024 oil spill off the coast of the Krasnodar region.

title: Russia Delays Moon and Venus Missions Again
summary: Luna-26 is planned to launch in 2028, while the Venus mission, previously rescheduled for the 2034-35 window, will now slip to 2036.

title: Lavrov Says ‘No Meeting Planned’ Between Putin and Zelensky
summary: The foreign minister’s remarks on Meet the Press were the latest and clearest indication that a Putin-Zelensky summit is nowhere on the horizon.
